nodes.text: Lakwurn was a Chiss male of the Xodlak family who served the Chiss Expansionary Defense Fleet, holding the rank of Lieutenant Commander. He was stationed aboard the Grayshrike, a heavy cruiser commanded by Senior Captain Lakinda, and worked as a hyperdrive technician.

Lakwurn informed Lakinda when Councilor Xodlak'uvi'vil declared a Xodlak family emergency posing as Patriel Xodlak'oo'nifis; summoning all available Xodlak family members from the Chiss Expansionary Defense Fleet to Celwis. At the same time, he handed Lakinda a brooch sent by Lakphro for Senior Captain Thrawn to analyze.
